message: A few guys here, including myself, have stated several time they need to work on this very area. Let's see if this article can help ... us!
name: What's my secret? An unoffical unconfirmed guide
caption: brendanforster.com
description: After survivingTechEd Australia- as well as hitting some important deadlines for a client - I was looking forward to getting back into various side-projects again now that things are coming back to (realtively) normal.

data.message:
عجبي انه وضح الحل لسببين انا شايفهم على رأس جبل الجليد الذي يمنع كثيرون -ولا استثني منهم نفسي في بعض الأحوال- من تطوير انفسهم بشكل سليم ومستمر
1- عدم وضع اهداف لتحقيقها
2- الخوف من الفشل أو اهتزاز صورته عند من يظنون انه محترف جدا

BTW guys, feel free to leave comments if you have questions about any parts of his advice. He is a VERY friendly guy (I know him a bit in person, we work for the same company, and currently at the same client, although not the same team).
